title: Vegan sweet potato peanut soup
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 large onion, minced', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '30g fresh root ginger, peeled and minced', '1 sweet potato, peeled and diced', '1L water', '300g creamy peanut butter', '5 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 lime, juiced', 'salt', 'crushed chilli flakes', '30g fresh coriander leaves', '1 handful peanuts, chopped']
